pathAssistantSteps.info:
New Leads are people who:


  1. Have reached out to American Reading Company, generally, but not the Account Manager specifically.
  2. The Account Manager has not yet personally reached out to.


Examples of New Leads include Webinar Attendees and Web Leads from ARC's website

Leads are in the Nuturing stage after the Account Manager has reached out to them personally but before the Account Manager knows whether there is a potential Opportunity.


Examples of activities during the Nuturing stage include personalized emails and phone calls.


After the Nuturing stage, a Lead is either deleted or converted using the buttons in the upper right-hand corner.
Congratulations! Now it’s time to convert the lead record to an opportunity. Then, continue the qualification process with your new contact.
If your lead has neither the interest nor the authority to purchase from you, mark the lead Unqualified.
